sourcesContent: import{isDesignToken as t}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{getCSSVariableIfValueIsThemeKey as r}from"../utils.js";const o=({breakpoint:o,breakpoints:e,propKey:n,values:s,tokens:i})=>{if(t(s))return s.toString();if("object"!=typeof s)return r(n,s,i);let p={};const a=Object.keys(e).sort(((t,r)=>e[t]-e[r]));return Array.isArray(s)?s.map(((t,r)=>{p[a[r]]=t})):p=s,(({breakpoint:o,breakpoints:e,propKey:n,values:s,tokens:i})=>{if(void 0!==s[o]){const e=s[o];return t(e)?e.toString():r(n,e,i)}const p=Object.keys(e).sort(((t,r)=>e[r]-e[t])),a=p.slice(p.indexOf(o));for(const o of a)if(void 0!==s[o]){const e=s[o];return t(e)?e.toString():r(n,e,i)}return null})({breakpoint:o,breakpoints:e,propKey:n,values:p,tokens:i})};export{o as getValueAtCurrentBreakpoint};
